charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Rosa challenged
Nita and Evelyn to a battle.
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1101_0200:
However, [Name:PlayerNickname ] and Rosa
lost the battle.
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_0300:
That was impressive! Just as expected, the Battle
Chatelaines sure are powerful.
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_0500:
But when it comes to teamwork, I think we had
the advantage.
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_0700:
Y-you see, Nita? It’s like our sisters
were saying...
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_0800:
The main battles on Pasio are team battles, so we
need to work on our teamwork in order to
get stronger.
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_0900:
I’m in charge of Single Battles! I don’t really
understand teamwork!
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_1000: Wha—?! And you were still that strong?
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_1100:
Come to think of it...I noticed that the two of you
weren’t in sync.
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_1200: All a battle has to be is good fun!
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_1400: Heeey! Are you gonna tell me what to do, Evelyn?
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_1800:
It seemed like the two were on the verge of a
fight, so maybe...
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_0302_2100:
He’s telling them to be nice to
each other.
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_2300:
I heard this story when I was in the
Unova region.
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_2400:
Long ago, there were two Pokémon that
did bad things. They caused strong winds
and thunderstorms.
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_2500:
Because of that, people’s houses and fields
were destroyed.
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_2600:
So Landorus, the Guardian of the Fields, punished
the two Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_2700:
Perhaps those Pokémon were also fighting
amongst themselves.
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_2800: Were the two Pokémon Tornadus and Thundurus?
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_3000:
No, but I have battled with Tornadus and
Thundurus before.
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_3100:
I’ve seen Landorus calm the other two down when
they began to fight, but...
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_3200: I didn’t know Landorus was a famous guardian.
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_3300:
It’s true. You were so caught up in having fun and
battling powerful Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_3400:
you just naturally befriended them without
realizing their power!
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_3600:
I still don’t really get it, but I’ll try taking
teamwork more seriously!
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_3800: Hehe, it seems Landorus taught them a lesson.
charaepi_ch0204_00_lanuit/2301_1201_4000:
Landorus reminded me of one of our sisters...
She’s scary, just like him!
